00020 
00021 using System;
00022 using System.Threading;
00023 using System.Collections;
00024 
00025 using Niry;
00026 using Niry.Utils;
00027 
00028 using NyFolder;
00029 using NyFolder.Utils;
00030 
00031 namespace NyFolder.Protocol {
00032     public delegate void LoginEventHandler (UserInfo info, bool status, string msg);
00033 
00035     public static class MyInfo {
00036         // ============================================
00037         // PUBLIC Events
00038         // ============================================
00039         public static event LoginEventHandler LoginChecked = null;
00040 
00041         // ============================================
00042         // PRIVATE (Singleton) Members
00043         // ============================================
00044         private static Timer timerWebStatusUpdate = null;
00045         private static UserInfo myInfo = null;
00046     
00047         // ============================================
00048         // PUBLIC STATIC Methods
00049         // ============================================
00051         public static void Initialize (string username) {
00052             myInfo = new UserInfo(username);
00053             myInfo.Informations.Add("magic", "None");
00054 
00055             LoginChecked = null;
00056             timerWebStatusUpdate = null;
00057         }
00058 
00060         public static void Initialize (string username, bool secureAuth) {
00061             myInfo = new UserInfo(username, secureAuth);
00062             if (secureAuth == false) myInfo.Informations.Add("magic", "None");
00063         }
00064 
00066         public static UserInfo GetInstance() {
00067             return(myInfo);
00068         }
00069 
00070         // ============================================
00071         // PUBLIC Methods (HttpRequest Required)
00072         // ============================================
00074         public static void Login (string password) {
00075             if (myInfo == null) {
00076                 string message = "Login Failed, MyInfo is not Initialized";
00077                 if (LoginChecked != null) LoginChecked(myInfo, false, message);
00078                 return;
00079             }
00080 
00081             // If it's Insecure Login, it's always OK
00082             if (myInfo.SecureAuthentication == false) {
00083                 string message = "Login Ok, Insecure Authentication";
00084                 if (LoginChecked != null) LoginChecked(myInfo, true, message);
00085                 return;
00086             }
00087 
00088             // Get Domain
00089             string domain = myInfo.GetDomain();
00090             if (domain == null) {
00091                 string message = "Domain Not Found, Check your UserName";
00092                 if (LoginChecked != null) LoginChecked(myInfo, false, message);
00093                 return;
00094             }
00095 
00096             myInfo.Informations.Add("Password", password);
00097             Thread thread = new Thread(new ThreadStart(CheckSecureLogin));
00098             thread.Start();         
00099         }
00100 
00102         public static void Logout() {
00103             if (myInfo == null) return;
00104 
00105             if (timerWebStatusUpdate != null) {
00106                 timerWebStatusUpdate.Dispose();
00107                 timerWebStatusUpdate = null;
00108             }
00109 
00110             // If it's Insecure Login, No Logout
00111             if (myInfo.SecureAuthentication == false)
00112                 return;
00113 
00114             // Do Logout
00115             try {
00116                 HttpRequest.Logout(myInfo);
00117             } catch (Exception e) {
00118                 Debug.Log("Logout Failed For {0}", myInfo.Name);
00119                 Debug.Log(e.Message);
00120             }
00121         }
00122 
00124         public static void ConnectToWebServer (int port) {
00125             if (myInfo == null) return;
00126 
00127             // If it's Insecure Login, Don't Connect To Web Server
00128             if (myInfo.SecureAuthentication == false)
00129                 return;
00130 
00131             // Connect To Web Server
00132             HttpRequest.Connect(myInfo, port);
00133         }
00134 
00136         public static void DisconnectFromWebServer() {
00137             if (myInfo == null) return;
00138 
00139             // If it's Insecure Login, You're Not Connected To Web Server
00140             if (myInfo.SecureAuthentication == false)
00141                 return;
00142 
00143             // Disconnect From Web Server
00144             HttpRequest.Disconnect(myInfo);
00145         }
00146 
00147         // ============================================
00148         // PUBLIC Methods
00149         // ============================================
00150 
00151         // ============================================
00152         // PRIVATE Methods
00153         // ============================================
00154         private static void CheckSecureLogin() {
00155             string message = "Login Failed";
00156             bool status = false;
00157 
00158             // Get And Remove Password From UserInfo
00159             string password = (string) myInfo.Informations["Password"];
00160             myInfo.Informations.Remove("Password");
00161 
00162             try {
00163                 Login login = new Login(myInfo);
00164 
00165                 if ((status = login.CheckSecureLogin(password)) == true)
00166                     message = "Login Ok";
00167 
00168                 // Start Update Web Status Timer ~5min (Less :D)
00169                 if (timerWebStatusUpdate != null) timerWebStatusUpdate = null;
00170                 timerWebStatusUpdate = new Timer(new TimerCallback(UpdateWebStatus), null, 0, 250000);
00171             } catch (Exception e) {
00172                 message = e.Message;
00173                 status = false;
00174             }
00175 
00176             // Send Login Checked Event
00177             if (LoginChecked != null) LoginChecked(myInfo, status, message);
00178         }
00179 
00180         // Web Server Time is 5 Minutes (300 sec, 300000 msec)
00181         private static void UpdateWebStatus (object obj) {
00182             try {
00183                 HttpRequest.Update(myInfo);
00184             } catch (Exception e) {
00185                 Debug.Log("Web Status Update Failed: {0}", e.Message);
00186             }
00187         }
00188 
00189         // ============================================
00190         // PUBLIC Properties
00191         // ============================================
00193         public static string Name {
00194             get { return(myInfo.Name); }
00195         }
00196     }
00197 }
